headline: Airwallex Raises $330M Series G at $8B Valuation, Establishes San Francisco as Dual Global Headquarters
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, December 08, 2025--Airwallex, a leading global financial platform for modern businesses, raised $330 million in a Series G funding round, led by Addition and with participation from T. Rowe Price, Activant, Lingotto, Robinhood Ventures and TIAA Ventures. The financing values Airwallex at $8 billion, a ~30% increase since its Series F six months ago. The investment will fuel Airwallex’s continued growth in the U.S. and key markets worldwide, while driving expanded AI hiring and pro
